resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107434</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107434</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202973</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Glacier Physics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gletscher-Physik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique de Glacier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física Da Geleira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica Del Ghiacciaio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική παγετώνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física Del Glaciar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site features a collection of visual resources about glaciers. Diagrams, images and animations reveal how a glacier forms, advances and retreats. These resources can be integrated into lectures, labs or other activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Situationsmerkmale eine Ansammlung 
Sichtbetriebsmittel über Gletscher. Diagramme, Bilder und 
Animationen decken, wie ein Gletscher sich bildet, Fortschritte und 
Rückzüge auf. Diese Betriebsmittel können in Vorträge, in 
Labors oder in andere Aktivitäten integriert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispositifs de ce site une collection de 
ressources visuelles au sujet des glaciers. Les diagrammes, les 
images et les animations indiquent comment un glacier forme, des 
avances et des retraites. Ces ressources peuvent être 
intégrées dans des conférences, des laboratoires ou d'autres 
activités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características deste local uma coleção de 
recursos visuais sobre geleiras. Os diagramas, as imagens e os 
animations revelam como uma geleira dá forma, avanços e recuos. 
Estes recursos podem ser integrados em lectures, em 
laboratórios ou em outras atividades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di questo luogo una collezione di 
risorse visive circa i ghiacciai. Gli schemi, le immagini e le 
animazioni rivelano come un ghiacciaio forma, avanzamenti e ritirate. 
Queste risorse possono essere integrate nelle conferenze, nei 
laboratori o in altre attività.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή χαρακτηρίζει μια συλλογή των οπτικών 
στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για τους παγετώνες. Τα διαγράμματα, 
οι εικόνες και οι ζωτικότητες αποκαλύπτουν πώς ένας παγετώνας 
διαμορφώνει, πρόοδοι και υποχωρήσεις. Αυτά τα στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς μπορούν να ενσωματωθούν στις διαλέξεις, τα 
εργαστήρια ή άλλες δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de este sitio una colección de 
recursos visuales sobre los glaciares. Los diagramas, las 
imágenes y las animaciones revelan cómo un glaciar forma, los 
avances y los retratamientos. Estos recursos se pueden integrar 
en conferencias, laboratorios u otras actividades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202973</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107434</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/glacier-physics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
